message: I'm excited to offer you this incredible product, which I believe will bring significant value to your business. I'm willing to sell it to you for $12000. This is a fair price considering its unique features and benefits.
I'm interested in the product, but I was hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $10000 for it.

I understand that you're interested in the product, but I'm afraid $10000 is a bit lower than I was hoping for. I'm willing to meet you halfway and sell it to you for $11500. This is the lowest price I'm willing to consider at this point.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was hoping to get a better price. I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product.
I'm not willing to go any lower than $11000, but I'm willing to make one more concession. I can sell it to you for $11250. This is the absolute lowest price I'm willing to consider.
I'm willing to pay $11000 for the product, but I'd like to get some additional value in return. Can we discuss a free warranty and some additional training?
